Title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
Writer: Dr. Seuss, Jeffrey Price, Peter S. Seaman
Plot: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

Title: Gladiator
Writer: David Franzoni, John Logan, William Nicholson
Actors: Russell Crowe, Joaquin Phoenix, Connie Nielsen
Plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
Country: United States, United Kingdom, Malta, Morocco

Title: The Perfect Storm
Actors: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, John C. Reilly
Plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

Title: Meet the Parents
Writer: Greg Glienna, Mary Ruth Clarke, Jim Herzfeld
Actors: Ben Stiller, Robert De Niro, Teri Polo
Plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

Title: X-Men
Writer: Tom DeSanto, Bryan Singer, David Hayter
Actors: Patrick Stewart, Hugh Jackman, Ian McKellen
Plot: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.
